segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, everything seems ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has her back to the sink, polishing that plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the faucet is still running full blast!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling everywhere, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or feel the wet floor under her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that shaky stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backâ€” he's going to fall and break something!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hand out like she deserves one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is irresponsible; they shouldn't be climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The pretty garden view is wasted on this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it escalates.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're sneaking treats behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR
